explanation: [0-0] A man in a black suit sits on a gray sofa with his head down, holding a metal tool in his right hand, on which lies white cheese. On a small pink table is a white plate with a slice of bread on it, next to the plate is a container with white cheese. Behind the man is a white wall, above which is a caption that reads: *Normal people spread something on bread*.

[0-7] The man picks up the bread with his left hand, holds the tool with the cheese in his right hand, spreads the cheese on the bread, then puts the bread on the plate, grabs the container with his left hand, scrapes the side of the container with the tool in his right hand, and then puts the tool on the container.

[7-16] Then the scene switches to the man in black holding a spoon in his right hand and a white bowl containing food in his left hand, eating. The caption above changes to *Normal people eat something spicy*. Then he chews the food in his mouth, and then is choked by the spice, picks up the water cup on the table with his right hand, and takes a large gulp.
